author: patinkaew
body:
#### PR description:

Backport of [cms-sw/cmssw#47934](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47934): ScoutingNano Event Content Changes for 2022-25.

#### PR validation:

Pass all tests from ```scram b runtests use-ibeos```.
Pass all ScoutingNano-related relval_nano workflows from 
```
runTheMatrix.py --ibeos -l 2500.131,2500.227,2500.228,2500.237,2500.238
```

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

This is a backport to 15_0_X release cycle for 2025 data-taking and ScoutingNano reprocessing of 2022-24 data.
title: [15_0_X] Backport of #47934 (ScoutingNano Event Content Changes for 2022-25)
